issue.subject: #__sdi_order_perimeter value is too short
issue.description:
#__sdi_order_perimeter value is too short. We tend to have truncated perimeters. Increase the size by changing type from *TEXT* to *LONGTEXT*. For reference : 
TINYBLOB, TINYTEXT       L + 1 bytes, where L < 2^8    (255 Bytes)
BLOB, TEXT               L + 2 bytes, where L < 2^16   (64 Kilobytes)
MEDIUMBLOB, MEDIUMTEXT   L + 3 bytes, where L < 2^24   (16 Megabytes)
LONGBLOB, LONGTEXT       L + 4 bytes, where L < 2^32   (4 Gigabytes)
